attributes.action: I want all children's social workers to wear body cameras.
attributes.additional_details: All to often there is back door discrimination, often families involved with services are vulnerable adults who don't know the system and how it works. Or were brought up In an already broken system.
attributes.background: social workers use reports as evidence in court on all cases which is memory based, where as if body cameras are used, evidence will be more accurate and factual.
